content.question: Let <math alttext="S" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>S</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the region in the second quadrant bounded by the graphs of <math alttext="y equals, x squared, times the natural log of, open parenthesis, 1 minus, x cubed, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y equals negative x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, as shown in the figure above. The graphs intersect at <math alttext="x equals A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following gives the volume of the solid generated when <math alttext="S" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>S</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is revolved about the line <math alttext="y equals negative 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="pi times, the integral from, A to 0, of, open parenthesis, open parenthesis, negative x, plus 1, close parenthesis, minus, open parenthesis, x squared, times the natural log of, open parenthesis, 1 minus, x cubed, close parenthesis, plus 1, close parenthesis, close parenthesis, squared, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>π</mi><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, A to 0, of, open parenthesis, open parenthesis, negative x, plus 1, close parenthesis, minus, open parenthesis, x squared, times the natural log of, open parenthesis, 1 minus, x cubed, close parenthesis, plus 1, close parenthesis, close parenthesis, squared, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="pi times, the integral from, A to 0, of, open parenthesis, open parenthesis, negative x, minus 1, close parenthesis, squared, minus, open parenthesis, x squared, times the natural log of, open parenthesis, 1 minus, x cubed, close parenthesis, minus 1, close parenthesis, squared, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>π</mi><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="pi times, the integral from, A to 0, of, open parenthesis, open parenthesis, negative x, plus 1, close parenthesis, squared, minus, open parenthesis, x squared, times the natural log of, open parenthesis, 1 minus, x cubed, close parenthesis, plus 1, close parenthesis, squared, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>π</mi><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
